metadata.title: CVE-2014-4722 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the OCS Reports Web Interface in OCS Inventory NG allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: ocsinventory-server package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
